pageProduct.name: Pain Away Heat + Pain Relief Cream 70g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

For Relief and Recovery of Joints & Muscles. Pain Away's active ingredients are traditionally used in western herbal medicine for the relief of - Symptoms of mild arthritis, bruising, mild joint pain and inflammation, muscle pain and inflammation, muscle sprains, strains & soreness.

Warnings

External use only - Avoid contact with eyes & open wounds. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. Contains Methyl Salicylate. Do not use if pregnant / planning pregnancy. Do not use in children under 6 years of age. Application to the skin may increase sensitivity to sunlight. Avoid prolonged sun exposure. If you have sensitive skin, test this product on a small area of skin before applying it to a large area. Contains ethanol.

Ingredients

Arnica Montana Flower Tincture, Rosemary Oil, Wintergreen Oil, Eucalyptus Oil, Boswellia Carterii Extract. Also contains Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E.

Directions

Directions for use - Apply on and around the painful areas and rub in. Repeat up to 5 times daily. If symptoms persist talk to your health professional.
